__e: Albert Einstein had expounded his theory of relativity back in 1905, and science had brought us the wonders of the modern world.
Can you imagine if Einstein would have given that up... just to get drunk with his buddies in Vienna every night.
If Einstein had the opportunity, he would have traveled back in time to prevent the creation of the atomic bomb.
Albert Einstein said that more than 50 years ago.
Do you know what Einstein himself said? You think you've got problems with arithmetic? I've got more fucking problems.
Yeah. Einstein himself said that they're God's way of remaining anonymous.
And he's taking Dr. Einstein and that cold companion with him.
Dr. Einstein and I need a place to sleep.
